trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_JALZAHN_000_000<tab>Once the soul energy within your relic is attuned, present it to me. I shall remove its coating of soulglaze, that its newfound power might be unleashed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_MENU_TITLE<tab>What would you like enhanced?
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_MENU_CHOICES<tab><var 28 ((Item)) E8020A /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_MENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_YESNO_MESSAGE<tab>Have <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> enhanced?
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_YESNO_YES<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_YESNO_NO<tab>No
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_JALZAHN_000_030<tab>Well? I cannot begin unless you lend me your weapon.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Please ensure that the relic you wish to enhance is placed in your Armoury Chest or inventory before speaking with Jalzahn.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_JALZAHN_000_040<tab>Hm, this relic does not appear to be soulglazed. If you wish to enhance it, just say the word, and I shall see the deed done.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>If you wish to have <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> soulglazed, speak with Jalzahn while equipped with the weapon, then select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Relic Weapon Novus Soulglazing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_JALZAHN_000_050<tab>Hm, I am afraid it is too early to remove the soulglaze. You have some ways to go before the soul energy within the relic is fully attuned.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>By using the Zodiac glass, it is possible to visually verify attunement progress.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Once your relic weapon novus has achieved full soul attunement, you may present it to Jalzahn to have it upgraded to a relic weapon nexus.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>If you misplace your Zodiac glass, you may obtain a replacement by speaking with Drake.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_JALZAHN_000_060<tab>We have already succeeded in enhancing this particular relic, have we not? You have no need for another, my friend.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>You already possess <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_JALZAHN_100_070<tab>I cannot well perform my work until you make room among your mess of possessions.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_JALZAHN_000_100<tab>Ah, yes, the telltale humming of power yearning to be set free. I scarcely require a Zodiac glass to see that your weapon's soul energy is now fully attuned.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_JALZAHN_000_101<tab>The soulglaze coating has served its purpose. The time is ripe for it to come off. This will take but a moment.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON040TRADE_00208_JALZAHN_000_102<tab>...It is done! Your weapon has awakened to its latent potential! Take it up once more, and feel its newfound power course through you!
